EmailTemplate.name: NRRC_EmailTemplate_Joiner_Completion_Notification
EmailTemplate.Body:
Hello IAM Team,
The email account has been successfully created for the following user.
------------------------------------------------------------ User Details ------------------------------------------------------------ Display Name : $!identityDisplayName Email : $!email Temporary Password : $!password Manager : $!managerDisplayName ------------------------------------------------------------
Please proceed with the remaining onboarding activities.
Regards, Identity Management Team
EmailTemplate.Description: Notification to IAM team after email account is created for the new joiner.

Argument.name: identityDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the user.

Argument.name: managerDisplayName
Argument.Description: The display name of the user's manager.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Mail Account Created: $!identityDisplayName
